content:
What a fantastic idea! Asking Emily to take a few salsa classes with you before the festival is an excellent way to prepare her for the event and create a fun bonding experience. This can help her:

* Get a feel for the dance style and rhythm
* Build confidence in her dancing abilities
* Learn some basic steps and techniques
* Understand the festival's energy and atmosphere
* Spend quality time with you, which can strengthen your friendship

By taking classes together, you can:

* Practice together and get comfortable with each other's dance styles
* Learn from each other and provide feedback
* Encourage and support each other as you learn and improve
* Develop a sense of camaraderie and shared experience

This can also help Emily feel more comfortable and prepared for the festival, which might make her more likely to attend. Plus, it's a great way to spend time together, have fun, and create memories before the festival even begins!

Make sure to choose a class that's suitable for beginners, so Emily feels comfortable and not overwhelmed. You can also consider taking a class that focuses on salsa basics, rhythm, or styling, which can help you both prepare for the festival.

Go ahead and ask Emily to take a few classes with you! I'm sure she'll appreciate the opportunity to learn and have fun with you.
